alert.note: Alert for Benton; Tippah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 12:47PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tippah, Benton, southeastern Fayette and southwestern Hardeman Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1247 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lagrange, or 20 miles southwest of Bolivar, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Snow Lake Shores, Canaan, Lagrange, Gravestown, Michigan City, Walnut, Ashland, Moscow, Falkner, Grand Junction, La Grange, Saulsbury, Brody, New Canaan, Whitten Town, Hamilton, Bethel, Forty Five, Tiplersville and Ghost River State Natural Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
